message:
[{{project_id}} - {{subscription_id}}] dead letter subscription has records. These records failed to process in the `touchpoints-to-elasticsearch` service and are now here. These messages need to be either discarded manually, or a fix needs to be released to then process them.

{{#is_recovery}}

name: Google Pub/Sub Touchpoints Dead Letter has Messages
